pullrequest.title: Upgrade to fuel-tools1 and automatically update paths -> pull request #2800

content.raw: In addition to setting path, we'll also need to let the gzserver know to download models from fuel instead of the existing model database if it's not already there. A quick search for `"ModelDatabase::Instance.*Get"` shows a couple more places where it's used:  [World.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bcbea7608b1ad88067ef652e8e7a4b93ec1001cf/gazebo/physics/World.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#World.cc-1951) and [SystemPaths.cc](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/bcbea7608b1ad88067ef652e8e7a4b93ec1001cf/gazebo/common/SystemPaths.cc?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#SystemPaths.cc-320). We'll somehow need to be able to identify which database the model is located and download from the right one.
content.html: In addition to setting path, we'll also need to let the gzserver know to download models from fuel instead of the existing model database if it's not already there. A quick search for "ModelDatabase::Instance.*Get" shows a couple more places where it's used: World.cc and SystemPaths.cc. We'll somehow need to be able to identify which database the model is located and download from the right one.
